original_text: Do not keep thinking how beautiful her body is. Do not let her use her eyes like a trap to catch you. Do not keep thinking how beautiful her body is. Do not let her use her eyes like a trap to catch you. Do not keep thinking how beautiful her body is. Do not let her use her eyes like a trap to catch you.
korean_text: 네 마음에 그의 아름다움을 탐하지 말며 그 눈꺼풀에 홀리지 말라

sentences.original_text: Do not let her use her eyes
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 자신의 눈을 사용하게 하지 말라

sentences.original_text: like a trap to catch you
